title: PICVideo MJPEG Codec 3
description:
PICVideo MJPEG Codec 3 is the codec of choice to choose when editing videos with programs such as Adobe Premiere CS3. It&#039;s fast and looks good therefore better than the default Cinemak codec in Premiere. I looked everywhere for it and here it is!
After installing go to Start Menu and go to configure Pegasus imaging. click on the picvideo codec and plug in the information :)
